effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Greater Dreadstalker at 265% effectiveness. Casting Summon Demonic Tyrant always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Casting Hand of Gul'dan causes your active Dreadstalkers to cast Dreadbite at 20% effectiveness. This damage is increased by 10% for each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Greater Dreadstalker at 265% effectiveness. Casting Summon Demonic Tyrant always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Casting Hand of Gul'dan causes your active Dreadstalkers to cast Dreadbite at 20% effectiveness. This damage is increased by 10% for each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan.
(2) Set: Your primary demon deals 5% increased damage, and your Shadow Bolt damage is increased by 50%.
(4) Set: Shadow Bolt has a chance to enrage your primary Felguard, increasing the damage of their next Legion Strike by 300%.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Greater Dreadstalker at 265% effectiveness. Casting Summon Demonic Tyrant always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Casting Hand of Gul'dan causes your active Dreadstalkers to cast Dreadbite at 20% effectiveness. This damage is increased by 10% for each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 3,722 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 546 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 551,372, and grants you up to 9,757 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
